code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from"swiper/react";import"swiper/css";import"swiper/css/pagination";import{Pagination,Autoplay}from"swiper/modules";import{gsap}from"gsap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const slides=[{title:"Welcome to classical studio",subtitle:"Learn, Perform, Shine",image:"/images/slide1.jpg"},{title:"Kathak Classes",subtitle:"Groove like a pro",image:"/images/slide2.jpg"},{title:"Move like a pro",subtitle:"Grace in motion",image:"/images/slide3.jpg"}];const Hero=()=>{useEffect(()=>{gsap.from(".hero-title",{y:50,opacity:1,duration:1});gsap.from(".hero-subtitle",{y:30,opacity:1,duration:1,delay:0.3});gsap.from(".hero-button",{y:20,opacity:1,duration:1,delay:0.6});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full h-screen relative",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{modules:[Pagination,Autoplay],spaceBetween:30,slidesPerView:1,autoplay:{delay:4000},pagination:{clickable:true},loop:true,children:slides.map((slide,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SwiperSlide,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full h-screen bg-cover bg-center flex flex-col justify-end items-center text-white pb-32",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(slide.image,")")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"hero-title text-5xl font-bold animate-fadeIn",children:slide.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"hero-subtitle mt-4 text-2xl animate-fadeIn",children:slide.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#classes",className:"hero-button mt-6 px-6 py-3 bg-red-500 rounded-lg text-lg font-semibold hover:bg-red-600",children:"Join Now"})]})},index))})});};export default Hero;
